languages.text: "Прости меня, Вольный Торговец. Я поддалась эмоциям и бежала. Это был недостойный порыв, и более он не повторится. Все теперь будет иначе, чем раньше".

traits.locale_text: "Прости меня, Вольный Торговец. Я поддалась эмоциям и бежала. Это был недостойный порыв, и более он не повториться. Все теперь будет иначе, чем раньше".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Forgive me, Rogue Trader. My emotions got the better of me, and I ran. It was an unworthy urge, one that will never see the light of day again. Everything will be different now."
languages.original_text: "Прости меня, Вольный Торговец. Я поддалась эмоциям и бежала. Это был недостойный порыв, и более он не повторится. Все теперь будет иначе, чем раньше".

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, Rogue Trader. My emotions got the better of me, and I ran. It was an unworthy urge, one that will never see the light of day again. Everything will be different now."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, Rogue Trader. My emotions got the better of me, and I ran. It was an unworthy urge, one that will never see the light of day again. Everything will be different now."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, Rogue Trader. My emotions got the better of me, and I ran. It was an unworthy urge, one that will never see the light of day again. Everything will be different now."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, Rogue Trader. My emotions got the better of me, and I ran. It was an unworthy urge, one that will never see the light of day again. Everything will be different now."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, Rogue Trader. My emotions got the better of me, and I ran. It was an unworthy urge, one that will never see the light of day again. Everything will be different now."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「許してほしい、自由開拓者。感情が我を打ち負かし、そして我は逃げた。それは卑しい衝動だった。二度と日の目を見ることのない衝動。今は全てが変わった」
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Rogue Trader. My emotions got the better of me, and I ran. It was an unworthy urge, one that will never see the light of day again. Everything will be different now."

traits.locale_text: 「許してほしい、自由開拓者。感情が我を打ち負かし、そして我は逃げた。それは卑しい衝動だった。二度と日の目を見ることのない衝動。今は全てが変わった」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “原谅我，行商浪人。那个时候，我受到情绪的控制，冲了进去。那样的冲动实在是毫无意义，我再也不会被它影响了。现在，一切都会不一样了。”
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Rogue Trader. My emotions got the better of me, and I ran. It was an unworthy urge, one that will never see the light of day again. Everything will be different now."

traits.locale_text: “原谅我，行商浪人。那个时候，我受到情绪的控制，冲了进去。那样的冲动实在是毫无意义，我再也不会被它影响了。现在，一切都会不一样了。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Pardonnez-moi, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mes émotions ont pris le dessus, et je me suis enfuie. J'ai cédé à une pulsion indigne, mais on ne m'y reprendra plus. Rien ne sera plus jamais pareil. »
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Rogue Trader. My emotions got the better of me, and I ran. It was an unworthy urge, one that will never see the light of day again. Everything will be different now."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez-moi, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mes émotions ont pris le dessus, et je me suis enfuie. J'ai cédé à une pulsion indigne, mais on ne m'y reprendra plus. Rien ne sera plus jamais pareil. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Perdóneme, Comerciante Independiente. Mis emociones se apoderaron de mí y corrí. Fue un ansia indigna que nunca volverá a ver la luz del día. Desde ahora, todo será diferente».
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Rogue Trader. My emotions got the better of me, and I ran. It was an unworthy urge, one that will never see the light of day again. Everything will be different now."

traits.locale_text: «Perdóneme, Comerciante Independiente. Mis emociones se apoderaron de mí y corrí. Fue un ansia indigna que nunca volverá a ver la luz del día. Desde ahora, todo será diferente».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Vergebt mir, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Meine Gefühle haben mich übermannt, und ich bin losgelaufen. Es war ein unwürdiger Drang, wie er niemals wieder das Tageslicht erblicken wird. Ab jetzt wird alles anders."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Rogue Trader. My emotions got the better of me, and I ran. It was an unworthy urge, one that will never see the light of day again. Everything will be different now."

traits.locale_text: "Vergebt mir, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Meine Gefühle haben mich übermannt, und ich bin losgelaufen. Es war ein unwürdiger Drang, wie er niemals wieder das Tageslicht erblicken wird. Ab jetzt wird alles anders."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Beni mazur gör Hür Tacir. Duygularımın bana hükmetmesine izin verip kaçtım. Aşağılık bir dürtüydü, tekrar gün yüzü görmeyecek. Bundan sonra her şey daha farklı olacak."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Rogue Trader. My emotions got the better of me, and I ran. It was an unworthy urge, one that will never see the light of day again. Everything will be different now."

traits.locale_text: "Beni mazur gör Hür Tacir. Duygularımın bana hükmetmesine izin verip kaçtım. Aşağılık bir dürtüydü, tekrar gün yüzü görmeyecek. Bundan sonra her şey daha farklı olacak."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
